item.title: Kenya police suspended over death of man in custody for online post
item.description: The police chief says there will be an independent investigation into how Albert Ojwang died.

item.title: South Korea cements cultural status with six Tonys for Maybe Happy Ending
item.description: The beloved musical won six awards at the top US honours for threatre.

item.title: How LA erupted over rumours of immigration raid at a hardware store
item.description: Claims that day labourers were being rounded up trigger violent protests in a city on edge over deportations.

item.title: Watch: National Guard on LA streets as unrest erupts
item.description: Protests flare up in Los Angeles, as demonstrators against immigration raids face off with law enforcement

item.title: The forgotten story of India's brush with presidential rule
item.description: Indira Gandhi's aides pushed for a presidential system - centralising power and sidelining courts and parliament.
